message: Cannot combine AUTOINCREMENT and multiple primary keys in SQLite.
details:
[17-May-2025 04:32:34 UTC] WordPress database error

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `wp_am_cart_abandonment` ( id BIGINT(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, checkout_id int(11) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100), cart_contents LONGTEXT, cart_total DECIMAL(10,2), session_id VARCHAR(60) NOT NULL, other_fields LONGTEXT, order_status ENUM( 'normal','abandoned','completed','lost') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'normal', unsubscribed boolean DEFAULT 0, coupon_code VARCHAR(50), time DATETIME DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`, `session_id`), UNIQUE KEY `session_id_UNIQUE` (`session_id`) ) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci
